result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘HR-CLARIN repository and services’) length (= 33) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘Repository and services of HR-CLARIN research infrastructure at the Institute of Linguistics, Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences, University of Zagreb.’) length (= 158) < 20 or > 100.
